articles.content: Back in June of 2019, the city of Rock Hill, South Carolina, threw itself something of a party. The occasion being celebrated was the local governments successful wooing of the Carolina Panthers, who… [+5128 chars]

articles.title: Max Scherzer Leads Mets to Double-Header Sweep - The New York Times
articles.description: The Mets won both games of a doubleheader against San Francisco, and Max Scherzer’s decision to pitch the second game was all about teamwork.
articles.content: This is just the level he competes at every time, so this is what you expect every time hes out there, catcher Tomas Nido said. But I guess the plan was going a lot smoother than when its not one of … [+1020 chars]
